talk.chat:
Neti:
I was also a famous Treasure Hunter when I was young... I was the one who retrieved the legendary Star Sapphire Crown from the Lost Harenak. In those days, they called me Aden's silver fox.
You've never heard of that name? Sigh... Well, it was a very long time ago...

Neti:
Why, greetings! I see you are a frequent traveler. Well, have you been here and there?
Since I got married, I am at home all day long, so sometimes I feel stifled. These days, I recollect the old memories of when I roamed around the kingdom. There were many hardships, but I miss the days when I could enjoy adventure and romance ...
Ask about old memories.
Quest
